items.title: Transportation Design with Tinkercad
items.headline: by Kids Can CAD Academy
objectives_summary: 3D Design using Tinkercad.

This course is All About Transportation.  Students follow "Lego-like" instructions to design six different 3D transportation models using Tinkercad.  Students should complete the Intro to 3D Design & 3D Printing course before registering for this course.

items.headline: Create a high resolution, sci-fi generator for use in animation, games, or film.
objectives_summary: Make a high poly model from scratch using 3ds max and ZBrush

items.title: Sculpting Female Characters in ZBrush
items.headline: Learn to properly model realistic female anatomy.  Learn masking, poly groups, isolating selections, subtools and more.
objectives_summary: Take your base mesh and add realistic detail
Learn how to incorporate proportion, muscle anatomy and bony landmarks into your sculpt.
Understand the importance of masking, poly groups, isolating selections, viewing silhouettes, inserting subtools and more.
